segments.text: What else should we do now after the floors are done and after the furniture is in ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We need to redo the curtains and paint all the walls and ceilings .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm the painter . You can be in charge of going to curtain shops to choose curtains . That will probably be pretty expensive too . Having good curtains made isn't cheap .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You mean we can't just buy curtains already made ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Absolutely not . The windows must be measured , and then the curtains need to be made professionally . So that will take a while . Maybe a month or so .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: While the curtains are being made , I can start having people look at the kitchen . I can't stand that old kitchen . I won't be able to cook there . I don't want to use that electric stove .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We need to find an interior decorating company to redecorate the kitchen . I believe in Portland there are shops that specialize in kitchen renovation . I will look in the Yellow Pages . I'd like a kitchen mostly in ivory and light green .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I agree . The colors must be soft and pleasant . You should feel comfortable when you cook our dinners .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Me ? Cook our dinners ? Hah ! You will be cooking , dear . You will cook .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I don't think so . I'll be too busy having tea in our new tea room .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I suppose we'll have to hire a cook then . So you won't be able to afford any clothes next year .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And you'll have to sell your motorcycle . And your cameras . Right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Maybe I'll cook once or twice a week . How is that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Four times might be enough . Not once or twice .
segments.speaker: S2
